    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:ait.opetaja.ee:fae0b74c5511cca3a60417796297401473a1d4b7</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>1</catalog>
            <entry>fae0b74c5511cca3a60417796297401473a1d4b7</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="et">Ilmastik</string>
            <string language="en">Climate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klima</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Climat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Clima</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Clima</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κλίμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Clima</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="et">MS PowerPoint'is esitlus ilmast. Piltide kaudu tutvustatakse päikest, vihma, rahet, vikerkaart, tuult, tormi, äikest ja lund.</string>
            <string language="en">MS PowerPoint presentation about weather. Through pictures are introduced sun, rain, rainbow, wind, storm, thunderstorm and snow.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="et">Alusharidus</string>
            <string language="et">Loodus</string>
            <string language="et">Ilmastik</string>
            <string language="en">Basic Education</string>
            <string language="en">Nature</string>
            <string language="en">Climate</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung des MS PowerPoint über Wetter. 
Durch Abbildungen ist eingeführte Sonne, Regen, Regenbogen, 
Wind, Sturm, Thunderstorm und Schnee.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La présentation de MME. PowerPoint 
survivent à environ. Par des images sont le soleil 
présenté, pluie, arc-en-ciel, vent, donnent l'assaut à, orage et neige.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação do MS PowerPoint sobre o tempo. 
Através dos retratos são o sol, a chuva, o arco-íris, o 
vento, a tempestade, o thunderstorm e a neve introduzidos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione della MS PowerPoint circa tempo. 
Attraverso le immagini sono il sole, la pioggia, il Rainbow, il 
vento, la tempesta, il thunderstorm e la neve introdotti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσίαση κρατών μελών PowerPoint για τον καιρό. 
Μέσω των εικόνων είναι εισαχθείς ήλιος, βροχή, ουράνιο 
τόξο, αέρας, θύελλα, thunderstorm και χιόνι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación de MS PowerPoint sobre el tiempo. 
A través de cuadros están el sol, la lluvia, el arco iris, el 
viento, la tormenta, la tempestad de truenos y la nieve introducidos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundlegende Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Natur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klima</string>
          </keyword>
